meanings.definition: The act of getting rid of something unwanted or unneeded.
meanings.sent1: After cleaning out the garage, we took several dumpings to the recycling center.
meanings.sent2: The dumpings of old furniture cluttered the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The dumpings of old toys made the room feel much more spacious.
meanings.sent4: Her dumpings of negative thoughts lifted a weight off her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The dumpings of old clothes were like shedding a layer of the past.

meanings.definition: Leftover food that is thrown away.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had to throw out the dumpings from the buffet at the end of the night.
meanings.sent2: She always made sure to clean out the fridge of any dumpings before they went bad.
meanings.sent3: The dumpings from dinner were quickly disposed of in the trash.
meanings.sent4: The dumpings of uneaten sandwiches were a waste of good food.
meanings.sent5: The dumpings of uneaten pizza were a sad sight to see.

meanings.definition: A mass of waste material that has been dumped.
meanings.sent1: The environmental group organized a cleanup to remove the dumpings from the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The city had to deal with illegal dumpings in the abandoned lot.
meanings.sent3: The dumpings of old tires created a makeshift obstacle course in the field.
meanings.sent4: The dumpings of construction debris were an eyesore in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The dumpings of trash overflowed from the bin, creating a mess on the street.
